message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product at a lower price elsewhere. I am willing to pay $15,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your position, but I know the true value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I am still seeking a price closer to my budget. Would you consider $16,000?
